==Activities==
===Year 2020===
In September, miHoYo established strategic cooperation with {{w|Zhangjiajie}} ({{zh|张家界}}) to promote cultural tourism in the city with the help of ''Genshin Impact''. The topography of Zhangjiajie's karst landscapes inspired the level designs of [[Jueyun Karst]] and [[Mt. Tianheng]]. After the agreement, two life-size [[Teleport Waypoints]] were installed at the {{w|Zhangjiajie National Forest Park}} ({{zh|张家界国家森林公园}}) and Huangshi Village ({{zh|黄石寨}}).<ref>[https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100603 "{{zh|米哈游×张家界：文旅合作新探索}}"]. ''mihoyo.com''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124432/https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100603 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 29, 2022.</ref><ref>{{zh|原神}} (September 25, 2020). [https://t.bilibili.com/438625802849156411 "{{zh|《原神》「从驻足到远行」线下活动圆满结束(๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧}}"]. ''Bilibili''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124432/https://t.bilibili.com/438625802849156411 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved August 3, 2022.</ref> Next, miHoYo cooperated with {{w|Huanglong Scenic and Historic Interest Area|Huanglong}} ({{zh|黄龙}}) for ecological environment protection. Huanglong's multicolored pools served as the inspiration for the level design of [[Luhua Pool]].<ref>[https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100605 "{{zh|米哈游×黄龙：赋能生态环境保护}}"]. ''mihoyo.com''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124436/https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100605 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. July 29, 2022.</ref>

In November, miHoYo and the China Social Welfare Foundation ({{zh|中国社会福利基金会}}) jointly launched the Yiqi Shouhu ({{zh|弈起守护}}) charity program. During the event, all profits from ''Tears of Themis'' charity gift packs were donated to the foundation as relief for children with autism.<ref>{{zh|米哈游}} (November 20, 2020). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/uhcdq4FMlbaHF555P9DM8w '{{zh|米哈游携手中国社会福利基金会：守护“星星的孩子”}}']. ''Weixin''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124433/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/uhcdq4FMlbaHF555P9DM8w Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 31, 2022.</ref>

===Year 2021===
[[File:Ruijin-miHoYo Laboratory.png|thumb|250px|Baoliang Lu (4th, left) and Haoyu Cai (3rd, right)]]
On March 4, miHoYo signed an agreement of strategic cooperation with {{w|Ruijin Hospital}} ({{zh|瑞金医院}}) to build the miHoYo Joint Laboratory of Encephalopathy Center of Ruijin Hospital ({{zh|瑞金医院脑病中心米哈游联合实验室}}), also called the Ruijin-miHoYo Laboratory.<ref>[https://www.sohu.com/a/522149265_204824 "{{zh|米哈游与上海交大的联合实验室，披露了部分在研项目}}"]. ''Sohu''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124432/https://www.sohu.com/a/522149265_204824 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 30, 2022.</ref> The two parties will combine their respective advantages in medical research and information technology to jointly develop brain-computer interface technology research. Baoliang Lü ({{zh|吕宝粮}}), a professor from the Department of Computer Science and Engineering of {{w|Shanghai Jiao Tong University}}, heads the laboratory; he was also the supervisor of miHoYo co-founder Haoyu Cai's master's thesis. The laboratory began with the research project "Clinical Research on Brain-Computer Interface Neuromodulation and Treatment of Refractory Depression."<ref>{{zh|文化观澜}} (March 4, 2021). [https://www.shobserver.com/staticsg/res/html/web/newsDetail.html?id=346777 "{{zh|爆款游戏《原神》出品公司米哈游与瑞金医院成立脑科学联合实验室，攻关难治性抑郁症}}"]. ''Shanghai Observer''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220126133507/https://www.shobserver.com/staticsg/res/html/web/newsDetail.html?id=346777 Archived] from the original on January 26, 2022. Retrieved July 28, 2022.</ref><ref>{{zh|李劲湘}} (March 9, 2021). [https://news.sjtu.edu.cn/jdyw/20210306/142715.html "{{zh|附属瑞金医院与上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司签约合作}}"]. ''{{zh|上海交通大学新闻学术网}}''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220129041314/https://news.sjtu.edu.cn/jdyw/20210306/142715.html Archived] from the original on January 29, 2022. Retrieved July 30, 2022.</ref>

In May, miHoYo established the Communist Youth League Committee under Shanghai miHoYo Network Technology Co., Ltd. The committee aims to integrate youth into company development and partake in the innovation and publicization of traditional Chinese culture. The committee created comics and travel maps with the help of ''Genshin Impact'' material to promote {{w|Xuhui District}} cultural tourism landmarks. The character [[Paimon]] was formally named "Xuhui Youth Culture Star Promoter."<ref>{{zh|疯鸭骑士}} (May 23, 2021). [https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv11397442/ '{{zh|米哈游《原神》IP派蒙成为“徐汇青年文化星推官”}}']. ''Bilibili''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124432/https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv11397442/ Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 27, 2022.</ref><ref>[https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100977 "{{zh|米哈游团委成立}}"]. ''mihoyo.com''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124435/https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100977 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 29, 2022.</ref>

[[File:Xinhuo Charity Program.png|thumb|250px|Construction of a new building for educational facilities]]
On July 12, the Xinhuo Charity Program ({{zh|薪火公益计划}}) was jointly launched by the {{w|China Youth Development Foundation}} and Shanghai miHoYo Network Technology Co., Ltd. The project is committed to paying attention to and supporting the development of youth education. The first phase involved Tongzi Primary School ({{zh|桐梓小学}}) in {{w|Yunnan|Yunnan Province}}, which got support from various aspects such as hardware conditions, educational facilities, teacher training, etc. The project also aims to provide school uniforms for all students and launch a teacher training program for seventeen primary schools in {{w|Yanjin County, Yunnan|Yanjin County}}.<ref>[https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100594 "{{zh|希望不熄 薪火永燃｜中国青基会与米哈游成立薪火公益计划}}"]. ''mihoyo.com''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124434/https://www.mihoyo.com/m/news/100594 Archived] from the original on September 22, 2022. Retrieved July 29, 2022.</ref><ref>{{zh|米哈游miHoYo}} (July 12, 2021). [https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV18g411T7nH "{{zh|「薪火公益计划」首站纪录片}}"]. ''Bilibili''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220802113843/https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV18g411T7nH/ Archived] from the original on August 2, 2022. Retrieved August 11, 2022.</ref>

On July 23, miHoYo delivered disaster relief supplies to {{w|Xinmi|Xinmi County}} in {{w|Henan|Henan Province}}. Henan Province experienced flooding due to heavy rainfall, affecting hundreds of people.<ref>{{zh|米哈游}} (July 23, 2021). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/PvEZXN2PmELw12NoCAQz1A "{{zh|紧急驰援河南！米哈游首批救灾物资预计今日抵达！}}"]. ''Weixin''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124438/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/PvEZXN2PmELw12NoCAQz1A Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved August 3, 2022.</ref>

In August, miHoYo Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. was selected as a "Key National Cultural Export Enterprise" along with ''Genshin Impact'' as a "Key National Cultural Export Project" for the 2021–2022 period. Previously, the company and ''Honkai Impact 3rd'' were selected for those titles in 2019. The annual ''List of National Cultural Export Key Enterprises and Key Projects'' is organized by the offices of the {{w|Ministry of Commerce (China)|Ministry of Commerce}}, {{w|Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China|Ministry of Finance}}, {{w|Ministry of Culture and Tourism of the People's Republic of China|Ministry of Culture and Tourism}}, and the {{w|Publicity Department of the Chinese Communist Party|Central Propaganda Department}}.<ref>[https://www.mihoyo.com/news/100593 "{{zh|米哈游再次入选国家文化出口重点企业 《原神》入选国家文化出口重点项目}}"]. ''mihoyo.com''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124433/https://www.mihoyo.com/news/100593 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 27, 2022.</ref>

In September, Shanghai miHoYo Network Technology Co., Ltd. was promoted from a party branch to a party committee under the {{w|Communist Party of China}}. The committee has five members, including Wei Liu as the committee secretary and miHoYo vice president Chunbo Yin ({{zh|殷春波}}).<ref>[https://www.mihoyo.com/news/100974 "{{zh|中国共产党上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司委员会党员大会顺利召开}}"]. ''mihoyo.com''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124433/https://www.mihoyo.com/news/100974 Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 6, 2022.</ref>

On November 26, the {{w|Internet Society of China}} ({{zh|中国互联网协会}}) released the China Internet Enterprise Comprehensive Strength Index ({{zh|中国互联网企业综合实力指数}}) for 2021. miHoYo was listed as one of "China's Top 100 Internet Enterprises with Comprehensive Strength"; miHoYo ranked 23rd on the list, 1st among Shanghai game companies, and 3rd among Shanghai internet companies. It was also the fifth consecutive time miHoYo was included in the list.<ref>{{zh|米哈游}} (November 29, 2021). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/gvTERA2PK1yw9A2CZ5vZjw "{{zh|2021年中国互联网综合实力企业百强揭晓 米哈游连续五年上榜}}"]. ''Weixin''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124439/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/gvTERA2PK1yw9A2CZ5vZjw Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 31, 2022.</ref>

===Year 2022===
In early 2022, miHoYo and NIO Capital led the first funding round for Energy Singularity, raising nearly 400 million RMB. Energy Singularity was established in 2021 in Shanghai, China. The company focuses on the research and development of {{w|High-temperature superconductivity|HTS}} (High-Temperature Superconductor) magnets, plasma physics, and artificial intelligence technologies to commercialize fusion energy. Using the funded capital, the company will develop an experimental {{w|tokamak}} device planned to be operational by 2024.<ref>Energy Singularity (February 26, 2022). [https://www.energysingularity.cn/en/energy-singularity-raises-nearly-rmb400-million-in-series-seed-funding-to-develop-fusion-energy/ "Energy Singularity Raises nearly RMB400 Million in Series Seed Funding to Develop Fusion Energy"]. ''energysingularity.cn''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124435/https://www.energysingularity.cn/en/energy-singularity-raises-nearly-rmb400-million-in-series-seed-funding-to-develop-fusion-energy/ Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved August 12, 2022.</ref>

[[File:MiHoYo Donation.png|thumb|250px|Boxes labelled as {{zh|米哈游 捐贈|Mǐhāyóu Juānzèng|Donated by miHoYo}}, containing disposable medical protective clothing]]
In February, {{w|2022 Shanghai COVID-19 outbreak|Shanghai experienced a COVID-19 outbreak}} that led to a city-wide lockdown until June. In March, miHoYo responded to the critical stage of the epidemic control by purchasing batches of supplies and donating them to the Caohejing ({{zh|漕河泾}}) and Hongmei ({{zh|虹梅}}) communities in Xuhui District. In April, the second batch of supplies included 10,000 sets of protective equipment, 10,000 bottles of hand sanitizer gel, 40,000 {{w|N95 respirator|N95}} masks, and 100,000 pieces of disinfection wipes.<ref>{{zh|米哈游}} (April 20, 2022). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2hlcw6i18ByL5oQGUmVo1A '{{zh|战“疫”有我，共克时艰 ——米哈游再次捐赠防疫物资，助力疫情防控}}']. ''Weixin''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124437/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2hlcw6i18ByL5oQGUmVo1A Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 31, 2022.</ref> miHoYo also donated pillows and peripheral products for children at a makeshift hospital at Shilong Road ({{zh|石龙路}}). In response to employees' needs, the company distributed food packages and epidemic prevention supplies to employees affected by the lockdown. The packages included fruits, vegetables, and disinfection and protection materials. Also provided were mental health counseling services.<ref>{{zh|米哈游招聘}} (April 25, 2022). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Nb5pPpcnI9x81toQgE_d4A "{{zh|米哈游er抗疫切片}}"]. ''Weixin''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124432/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Nb5pPpcnI9x81toQgE_d4A Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved August 1, 2022.</ref>

On May 20, miHoYo participated in a funding round for Oriental Space Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd. ({{zh|东方技术空间(山东)科有限公司}}), which raised 400 million RMB. The company focuses on aerospace technology and will develop a launch vehicle and a reusable liquid oxygen and kerosene rocket engine using the raised funds. The plan is for the rocket to launch in mid-2023.<ref>[https://www.qixin.com/brand/53ed82cc-7f39-4915-99b3-444ebac2466b/7MPYImQP5jrjHNrFXnZMn9jE85NPTERNMasNHq0sk1R8rLUCHLrBywPoCFwTgVbr "{{zh|东方空间}}"]. Retrieved August 14, 2022.</ref><ref>Jones, Andrew (May 20, 2022). [https://spacenews.com/chinese-launch-startup-orienspace-raises-59-9-million-in-series-a-round/ "Chinese launch startup Orienspace raises $59.9 million in Series A round"]. ''SpaceNews''. Retrieved August 14, 2022.</ref><ref>{{zh|游戏葡萄}} (May 21, 2022). [https://3g.163.com/dy/article/H7TFB1PL05268BP2.html "{{zh|米哈游投资了一家民营火箭科技公司}}"]. ''NetEase''. Retrieved August 14, 2022.</ref><ref>Sina Finance (May 20, 2022). [https://finance.sina.com.cn/tech/2022-05-20/doc-imcwiwst8414660.shtml "{{zh|民营火箭东方空间完成4亿元A轮融资}}"]. ''Sina Finance''. On July 8, Shanghai miHoYo Network Technology Co., Ltd. had its first trade union congress. miHoYo vice president Chunbo Yin was elected as the chairman of the first session of miHoYo's trade union committee. Among those in attendance at the inaugural meeting was Chairman Weihong Zhu ({{zh|朱伟红}}) of the Xuhui District Federation of Trade Unions ({{zh|徐汇区总工会}}). Zhu stated that miHoYo's establishment of a trade union not only helps safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of employees, promotes the high-quality development of enterprises and industries, but also serves the economic development of trade union organizations.<ref>{{zh|米哈游}} (July 8, 2022). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/p0T1UjDS7Jg8xOVg9TA3tQ "{{zh|上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司工会成立大会顺利召开！}}"]. ''Weixin''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220826124439/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/p0T1UjDS7Jg8xOVg9TA3tQ Archived] from the original on August 26, 2022. Retrieved July 31, 2022.</ref>

[[File:Xinhuo Charity Program Phase 2.jpg|thumb|250px|The new building of Tongzi Primary School]]
On August 15, miHoYo released a video about the second phase of the Xinhuo Charity Program, which showed the completed construction of Tongzi Primary School's new building from the first phase. Students can study in the multimedia classrooms of the building with upgraded hardware. Furthermore, new street lamps were installed on the campus for the safety of the students at night. The second phase also included the construction of a waterway, flush toilet, bathroom, and solar-powered water stations for the student and staff dormitory at Bazha Village Central Primary School ({{zh|巴扎乡中心学校}}) in Qinghai Province ({{zh|青海省}}). The construction expects completion in the second half of 2022.<ref>{{zh|米哈游miHoYo}} (August 15, 2022).[https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Je4y1f7Qe "{{zh|「薪火公益计划」第二站纪录片}}"]. ''Bilibili''. [https://web.archive.org/web/20220815110614/https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Je4y1f7Qe/ Archived] from the original on August 15, 2022. Retrieved August 16, 2022.</ref>

===Year 2023===
In February 2023, during the 2022 China Game Industry Annual Conference ({{zh|2022年度中国游戏产业年会}}), hosted by the China Audio-Video and Digital Publishing Association ({{zh|中国音像与数字出版协会}}) and sponsored by the National Press and Publication Administration (NPPA),<ref>{{zh|每日经济新闻}} (February 15, 2023). [https://www.nbd.com.cn/articles/2023-02-15/2669762.html "{{zh|游戏产业年会观察⑤ 腾讯、网易、三七互娱、米哈游等龙头公司领头人交出2023目标“小作文” }}"]. ''nbd.com.cn''. [https://archive.fo/3e1tN Archived] from the original on February 15, 2023. Retrieved February 15, 2023.</ref> announced miHoYo as a recipient of two awards. The company was selected as one of the Top Ten "Going Global" Game Enterprises, and the game ''Genshin Impact'' as one of the Top Ten Outstanding Mobile Games. miHoYo and ''Genshin Impact'' were also nominated for several other awards.<ref>{{zh|米哈游}} (February 15, 2023). [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/2PMo8O5ojguSgOvZozJB7Q "{{zh|米哈游荣获2022中国游戏十强优秀“走出去”游戏企业等奖项}}"]. ''Weixin''. [https://archive.fo/EOBlR Archived] from the original on February 15, 2023. |October 20, 2014
|'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:'''<!--刘伟 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司总裁--> {{zh|他们会为自己喜欢的东西去支付一定的价钱。就是说你会看到这样一群用户他会愿意为自己喜欢的一些角色或者自己喜欢的动画去买一些。看起来性价比不是那么高的东西但是本身能够为他自己带来很强的愉悦感的东西。他会更追求精神层面的愉悦。其实我觉得这是可能不同于其他用户的一个特点就是他们会为爱去买单。}}<br /><br />'''Xiong Yan, Deputy Director of the Shanghai Science and Technology Entrepreneurship Center:'''<!--严雄 上海市科技创业中心副主任--> {{zh|死亡谷的概念是国际上研究企业成长周期时提出来的。如果企业在两到三年里面只有持续投入而没有产出的话，它是很难过去的。这种时候我们通过孵化器通过降低创新成本帮助他们持续发展。}}
|-
|April 8, 2015
|'''Zheng Han, Party Secretary of Shanghai:''' {{zh|你现在团队有多少人？}}<br /><br />'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:''' {{zh|60多个人。}}<br /><br />'''Zheng Han, Party Secretary of Shanghai:''' {{zh|你(20)11年创业的时候是研究生毕业了吗？}}<br /><br />'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:''' {{zh|我(当时)是研究生二年级我是(20)12年毕业的。我另外一个合伙人是延期一年(20)13年毕业，我另外一个合伙人是延期两年(20)14年毕业，但我们(20)11年就开始创业了。}}<br /><br />'''Zheng Han, Party Secretary of Shanghai:''' {{zh|不错不错，这些必须要这些年轻人去闯的。}}
|-
|February 8, 2016
|'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:'''<!--刘伟 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司总裁--> {{zh|他们会为自己喜欢的东西去支付一定的价钱。就是说你会看到这样一群用户他会愿意为自己喜欢的一些角色或者自己喜欢的动画去买一些。看起来性价比不是那么高的东西但是本身能够为他自己带来很强的愉悦感的东西。他会更追求精神层面的愉悦。其实我觉得这是可能不同于其他用户的一个特点就是他们会为爱去买单。}}
|-
|January 15, 2019
|'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:'''<!--刘伟 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司总裁--> {{zh|这里是我们的漫画和编剧团队。我们一开始创业就是从这样的团队开始的。一开始的时候有几个人我们是三个交大的同学开始创业的。后来又招募了另外几个小伙伴一共是七个小伙伴。那时候大家一看不懂移动互联网二看不懂国产动漫这个行业。基本上是无人问津。}}<br /><br />'''Qinghua Zhang, Art Director:'''<!--张庆华美术总监、米哈游第一名员工--> {{zh|我们从早上8点到晚上11点基本上一周每天都这样持续了三个月都在学校里尽力地做第一个项目。}}<br /><br />'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:''' {{zh|2014年国产动漫迎来爆发。我们终于有机会做自己的原创动画。我们非常想专注在这个领域做。一般的公司在发展中都会想着快速扩张可能会想做更多产品。这个时候可能会造成管理压力过大或者 企业文化稀释。首先第一点是我们身处的这么一个伟大的时代。第二点是因为我们身处上海。在上海这么一个公平公正的环境里我们做这样一个文化创意产业可以完全凭借我们自己的热情和创新创意能力在这个市场上活下来。}}
|-
|July 7, 2020
|'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:'''<!--刘伟 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司总裁--> {{zh|(希望)在面向海外去推介我们上海文化中国文化的时候能够把游戏行业的企业也作为一个重要的排头兵。}}<br /><br />'''Yimeng Huang, CEO of Xindong Network Co., Ltd.:'''<!--黄一孟 心动网络股份有限公司首席执行官--> {{zh|taptap这样一个平台最大的区别是我们不收取这个渠道的费用相当于没有中间商赚 差价。在这过程中所有开发者的利益就会最大化对于玩家来说我的平台也会更公正。对于整个游戏产业的研究，对于游戏未来发展方向的研究以及在全球化的视野中游戏行业未来会如何发展。如果有一些专业的研究机构能在这些领域多做一些探索的话，我觉得对整个行业都能够有很大的帮助。}}<br /><br />'''Yayuan Wang, Deputy Director of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee Propaganda Department:'''<!--王亚元 上海市委宣传部副部长--> {{zh|通过对世界游戏产业的研究和分析，有助于上海精品游戏走出国门同时也将吸引更多的世界上优秀的游戏企业落户上海。}}
|-
|January 13, 2022
|'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:'''<!--刘伟 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司总裁--> {{zh|曲高未必人不识自有知音和清词有一些国外友人说我以前都不知道中国的戏曲文化是这样的。他们甚至会专门去中国国际电视台以前发的经典戏曲唱段下去看去学习和了解。我们也是希望通过这种创新的现代化的表达能够让传统文化被更多年轻人被国际上的朋友所认识和了解。}}<br /><br />'''Yang Yang, Actor of Shanghai Peking Opera Theater:'''<!--杨扬 上海京剧院演员--> {{zh|这个热度真的是我没有想象到的。游戏对中国传统文化的宣传力度实在是太大了。从他们的留言看出来都是很年轻的。也是我们希望看到的。}}
|-
|February 21, 2022
|'''Ms. Zhu, Complainant:'''<!--朱女士 投诉人--> {{zh|她还是可以用虚拟身份证在《原神》包括《崩3》玩游戏未成年去买双改号(一种游戏账号类型)。她肯定不会改成本人(未成年人的)身份证。我们要求上架人脸(识别)你知道吗因为上架人脸可以合理规范像腾讯网易一样可以规范未成年。}}<br /><br />'''miHoYo Staff:'''<!--上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司工作人员--> {{zh|后续我们也会要求所有用户包括我们新的和现有用户都能实现实名匹配。人脸识别方式现在我们在测试当中但因为技术方面尝试用不同数据库去介入保证用户体验的完善。}}<br /><br />'''Chunbo Yin, Vice President of miHoYo:'''<!--殷春波 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司副总裁--> {{zh|我们后面也会利用我们大数据的一个功能包括可能我们会采用人脸识别等一些新兴的技术加强对未成年人沉迷网络游戏的防控。其实我们企业也是希望和家庭和学校一起共同努力营造一个有利于青少年成长的良好的环境。}}
|-
|January 23, 2023
|'''Wei Liu, President of miHoYo:'''<!--刘伟 上海米哈游网络科技股份有限公司总裁--> {{zh|我们在科创上的投入是非常大的。截止2022年底我们整个发明专利申请超过了400多项。在这样的一个发明专利的支撑下，我们在多项技术上相对比较领先。公司发展的第二个十年，我们也给自己定了一个目标2030年打造出10亿人愿意生活其中的虚拟世界。}}
|}
